title: Bug 118780 - Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when select the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double clicking on the first column name, the original name of the column is shown below the expression builder.
EB: According to scr 78193 in tracker, the first column in the expression builder should use the alias name instead of the original name.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder. 
2. Select the dataset. 
3. Double-click on the first column name. 
4. Observe the behavior and verify if the original name or the alias name is displayed in the expression builder.
